subject: New JUnit snapshot with Hamcrest 1.3 available
msgSnippet: Hi folks, I am glad to announce that there is a new JUnit snapshot available through GitHub and Maven. It includes/references the recently released Hamcrest
messageBody:
Hi folks,

I am glad to announce that there is a new JUnit snapshot available through GitHub and Maven. It includes/references the recently released Hamcrest 1.3.

It would help us a great deal if some of you could give it a try and provide feedback. In particular, if you make heavy use of assertThat and Hamcrest matchers, please report any incompatibilities that you might experience.

Cheers, Marc
